https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bgAnw2D7ySjoT52eJN1TGUNaiZB.jpg A serial killer is terrorizing Arizona with the police in hot pursuit. What the police don't know is that a mysterious group are also pursuing the same killer to stop the killer from unleashing an evil like nothing before. From Vampires to Biblical wrath - everything comes down to one showdown! Blood Widow
